suite.name: Example BDT

test.name: Edit New Product In Catalog With Db Validation

kw.name: Setup configure test for edit product
Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=bitnami_opencart, user=root, passwd=, host=127.0.0.1, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to DEBUG.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Check If Exists In Database
kw.doc: Check if any row would be returned by given the input `selectStatement`. If there are no results, then this will throw an AssertionError. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Check If Exists In Database | select model from oc_product where model = 'TestProduct'
Executing : Query | select model from oc_product where model = 'TestProduct'

kw.name: Check If Exists In Database
kw.doc: Check if any row would be returned by given the input `selectStatement`. If there are no results, then this will throw an AssertionError. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Check If Exists In Database | select name from oc_product_description where name = 'TestProduct'
Executing : Query | select name from oc_product_description where name = 'TestProduct'

kw.name: Release configure test for edit product
Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | delete from oc_product where model = 'TestProduct'

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | delete from oc_product_description where name = 'TestProduct'

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
